Articles.Content:
Here's an interplanetary transfer vehicle:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Delta-v: 4258

Kerbals: 11

Docking ports: 2

Solar panels: 2

Engines: 2 non-nuclear (feel free to put nuclear engines on it)

RCS & SAS

Untested: Yes (it should work)

Stock: YES!

Designed to launch atop a Omega: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113356-It-s-here!-The-Omega-good-looking-heavy-lift-vehicle

The Omega second stage has enough fuel to put this on a kerbin escape trajectory.

Built with stock revamp(works with stock).

Enjoy:

I removed pfairing parts from the download.

Download

Edited June 27, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist
Hello, you should remove the stock tag as you used some mods in the build. Ooh, and welcome to the forum!

I should have only used stock revamp which I believe is compatible with stock, I'll test it when I get a chance.

P.S.

The pics show pfairings but I removed those from the download.

P.P.S.

Thanks for the welcome!

EDIT:

Works with stock.

Edited March 18, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist
